PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-05392018-05-14,  ECCC,  ,  , 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the METAL MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to reduce the risks of negative effects of mines on fish and fish habitat, improve the efficiency of certain performance measurement and evaluation requirements, and provide regulatory clarity, regarding releases of effluent to fish frequented water bodies, for diamond mines.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0099 Publication Date: 2018-05-30
AttachmentsAttachment
